bitenum.description: LSE does the process for slice boundary after receiving int_eos.
int_eos is passed through to SYNCBOX_MC3 without the process for slice boundary.

bitfield.description: OCP error status bit [11]: OCP DMA IP_CORE side [10]: OCP DMA SL2 side [9]: OCP CFG IP_CORE side.Writing 0 is ignored. These bits remain 1 until RESET or until host sets to 1. .
Status Adaptv_add() value This signal is cleared, if Token_clr = 1.

LSE internal signals are initialized to understand prologue(first MB) as below: -token status signal -token start/end signal -DMA pointer. Writing 0 is ignored. Writing 1 clears some internal signal. This is a self-clearing bit. The host always reads 0. If this is not used for initialization at prologue, some internal signal is kept. Also, synchronization does not function well.

bitenum.description: Enable internal BFSW change (default). Then, LSE controls BFSW after LD task finished.
Disable BFSW change (if host wants to control BFSW with each task step by step with LD_GO, Comp_GO and ST_GO)
LSE command is undefined. Writing 0 is ignored. These bits remain 1 until RESET or Token_clr or until host sets to 1.

bitfield.description: Execute LOAD task on bypass mode Target ParamAddr_ld_byps need to set before this bit is set.

bitenum.description: Idle. Writing 0 is ignored This bit is cleared after LD task finishes..
Execute LD task. LSE access to ParamAddr_ld_byps and execute the command for LOAD task.

bitfield.description: Execute Comp task on bypass modeIn normal mode, LSE executes COMP commands, followed by LD commands. .

bitenum.description: Idle. Writing 0 is ignored This bit is cleared after Comp task finishes.
Execute Comp task. In single step mode, LSE access to ParamAddr_ld_byps and execute the command for Comp task.

bitfield.description: Execute Store task on bypass mode Target ParamAddr_st_byps needs to set before this bit is set.

bitenum.description: Idle. Writing 0 is ignored This bit is cleared after ST task finishes.
Execute Store task. LSE access to ParamAddr_st_byps and execute the command for Store task.
LSE function normal SYNCBOX_MC3 mode and waits NewTaskSignal. This value should not change during execution.
LSE functions SYNCBOX_MC3 bypass mode and executes the task of go_bit.

register.description: Parameter address for SB Bypass mode

bitfield.description: Only used in bypass mode. Address of the first command of LD and COMP sequence [128-bit word unit]. This is 128-bit word address, not byte address. The conversion from byte address to 128-bit word address should be done by the CPU. IfLSE_CTRL SB_BYPS is 1, this value is used. In bypass mode, this address is given through this field, instead of through SYNCBOX_MC3. Also, this field is used in single-step mode.

Only used in bypass mode. Address of the first command of ST sequence [128-bit word unit]. This is 128-bit word address, not byte address. The conversion from byte address to 128-bit word address should be done by the CPU. IfLSE_CTRL SB_BYPS is 1, this value is used. In bypass mode, this address is given through this field, instead of through SYNCBOX_MC3. .Also, this field is used in single-step mode.
